title: AI and Python Developer
description: Developing and integrating AI models with SIP call agents to enable intelligent responses and function triggering. Leading projects involving OpenAI agent SDKs for hiring automation and previously for taxi booking services.
responsibilities: Integrate LLMs and AI models with SIP call agents for real-time dialogue and function execution
Design and deploy AI-driven workflows for customer and business automation
Develop prompt engineering strategies for diverse agent tasks
Lead new project for hiring automation using OpenAI agent SDKs
Previously built and maintained AI-powered taxi booking agent system
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deploy scalable AI solutions
Implement backend APIs and services using Django and FastAPI

title: Freelance Data Analytics & Migration Specialist
description: Led comprehensive data migration and analytics modernization projects for multiple clients. Specialized in migrating legacy SAS workflows to modern SQL databases and Python-based analytics solutions. Transformed manual Excel-based reporting systems into automated, interactive dashboards using Python, Plotly, and Quarto. Successfully delivered SAS to Power BI migration projects, enabling clients to leverage modern business intelligence tools.
responsibilities: Migrated complex SAS data processing workflows to SQL databases for improved performance and maintainability
Automated manual Excel-based reporting systems using Python, Plotly, and Quarto
Developed interactive dashboards and visualizations replacing static Excel charts
Led SAS to Power BI migration projects for business intelligence modernization
Created comprehensive documentation and training materials for client teams
Optimized data pipelines resulting in 70% reduction in processing time
Implemented data validation and quality checks for migration accuracy

responsibilities: Designed and implemented the GUI for the planto.ai VS Code extension
